name: Eleventh Hour (plasmastarfish)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50. All art, audio, and game code (exclusing some base code for buttons and spritesheets) made during the jam period.

The included build is for Windows, but any computer that can run Python 3.7 should be able to install PyGame and run from source.

Art: Paint.NET

Music: MuseScore 3

SFX: SFXR, Audacity

Code: Python/PyGame

Fonts: Alef, Voyager
